0.9.name: wordpress/alluric-admin
0.9.description: Alluric Admin is a Wordpress plugin that gives a new look for its Administration panels, with an in-built dropdown menu feature. It is currently in beta but available for download. Many thanks to Dean Robinson for the backend and Ozh for the dropdown menu code.
